SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
cart
Represents a shopping cart that can be used to add and remove items, view the contents of the cart, and calculate the total cost.
Catalog
A class that represents a catalog of items, which can be viewed by category.
item
A class that represents an item in the system.
itemDB
A class that represents a database of items.
Login
A class that represents a login screen for the ToffeApp.
OTP
A class that generates and sends OTPs (one-time passwords) via email.
Payment
A class that represents a payment screen for an online store.
person
An abstract class that represents a person with a name, email, password, and address.
PersonDB
The PersonDB class provides methods to manage a list of Customer objects stored in a text file.
SignUp
The SignUp class provides methods to get input from the user to create a new account, validate the input, and save the account information to a file.
user
A subclass of `person` that represents a user of the system.
